name: Cub
text: On Play: You may rest 1 of your {Dressrosa} type Leader or Stage cards: Return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 1 or less to the owner's hand.

effect.text: You may rest 1 of your {Dressrosa} type Leader or Stage cards: Return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 1 or less to the owner's hand.

meta.notes: Card is a sample and has 'SAMPLE' watermark. Rarity is UC as printed. Power is 2000 as printed. Life is not printed for Character cards. Counter value is 1000 as printed.
